item.title: Running large simulations on a desktop computer with R (tips & tricks)
item.description: Let me briefly describe what I learned while attempting to run a large simulation on my desktop computer as I think it might be useful to others. Here is the problem: I was forced to run a simulation on my desktop computer because brms couldn’t be installed on my department’s high performance computing (HPC) cluster.
